text: Edmund John Kellaway (September 26, 1877 - September 6, 1959) was an English movie, television, and stage actor who is known for his role as Santa Claus in Miracle on 34th Street. Gwenn won an Academy Award and two Golden Globe Awards. Gwenn was born in Wandsworth, London, England on September 26, 1877.Birth certificate He studied at St. Olave's School and King's College London. Gwenn was married to Minnie Terry for one day in 1901. They divorced the same day they married. Gwenn died on September 6, 1959 from pneumonia cause by a stroke in his Woodland Hills, Los Angeles home, aged 81.Obituary Variety, 23 September 1959, page 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1877 births Category:1959 deaths Category:English Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from London Category:British silent movie actors Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from stroke Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Infectious disease deaths in Los Angeles Category:People from Wandsworth
title: Edmund Gwenn
